entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
